anya-e1208n0:281_0: Tathā na sevetha na tassa doso;
anya-e1208n0:284_0: Na tassa doso na sukhaṃ vajeyya,
anya-e1208n0:289_0: Na tassa doso ta labhe tikicchaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:476_0: Medhāya nando thiravāci kheme; (Kavināma gabbha cakkaṃ)
anya-e1208n0:479_0: Dāyato vasato na’nusantāsassa hitesino; (Gāthaddhavisaya paṭiloma yamakaṃ)
anya-e1208n0:482_0: Sakāyanā’nāya’kāsa vāma nā ga ganā’mavā; (Sabbato bhadda bandhanaṃ)
anya-e1208n0:491_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedhabrāhmaṇāpadānaparidīpo.
anya-e1208n0:504_0: Sambuddho so itipi arahaṃ tyādinā’bbhuggataṃ taṃ,
anya-e1208n0:518_0: Abbhuggantvā atha himavatā so sumedho tapassi
anya-e1208n0:519_0: Gacchaṃ tesaṃ upari nabhasā vākacīraṃ dhunanno,
anya-e1208n0:536_0: Sajjetuṃ te sapadi muditā sādhavo tassa’daṃsu; ()
anya-e1208n0:566_0: Sambuddhoyaṃ vajatu iti me dīgharattaṃ hitāya; ()
anya-e1208n0:573_0: Sutvā gāthāpadampi na me bhāriyaṃ saṃkilese
anya-e1208n0:596_0: Patvā bodhiṃ ahamiva siyā gotamo nāma buddho; ()
anya-e1208n0:598_0: Tumhe sampassatha iti imaṃ tāpasaṃ saṅghamajjhe
anya-e1208n0:605_0: Bimbā bimbā dharavati piyā hema bimbā bhirāmā
anya-e1208n0:613_0: Assattho te vijayaviṭapī tvañca kho gotamavho
anya-e1208n0:615_0: Pāyāsaggaṃ parivisiya bho tvaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ
anya-e1208n0:616_0: Bodhiṃ bujjhissasi iti dhuvaṃ bodhimūle nisajja; ()
anya-e1208n0:633_0: Rammaṃ rammaṃ mahīya jaṭilaṃ pupphamuṭṭhīhi katvā
anya-e1208n0:638_0: Tamhā ṭhānā gatasati jane sannisinnassa tassa
anya-e1208n0:651_0: Āvajjesi kati iti sudhī dhammadhātuṃ sahetuṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:656_0: Nibbinno mā bhavi’ti paṭhamaṃ pāramiṃ’dhiṭṭhahi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:671_0: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi tvamiti matimā pāramiṃ so catutthiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:694_0: Sītattaṃ sampharati hi samaṃ vārinā bhāvayeni,
anya-e1208n0:696_0: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi samuti navamiṃ pāramiṃ metta citto; ()
anya-e1208n0:699_0: Majjhattā’yaṃ vasumativadhū hoti dukkhe sukheka vā,
anya-e1208n0:700_0: Evaṃ bho tvaṃ bhava samatulāsantibho’pekkha ko’ti
anya-e1208n0:713_0: Nikkaṅkhā te punapi nagarā nāgarā taṃ upecca
anya-e1208n0:718_0: Mā te rogo bhavi paṭibhayaṃ mā bhavi chambhitattaṃ
anya-e1208n0:724_0: Bodhātvo himavati sakaṃ assamaṃ tāpaso so,
anya-e1208n0:742_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jitavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne
anya-e1208n0:742_1: sumedha tāpasassa mūlapaṇiṭhānaṭṭhapanapavatti paridīpo dutiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:1037_0: Dve sīvali ñca samaṇīsu varā surāmā; ()
anya-e1208n0:1203_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatitā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne
anya-e1208n0:1203_1: bodhisattassa sesapaṇidhātaṭṭhapana pavatti paridīpo tatiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:1333_0: Pabbajjituṃ sapariso pavanaṃ jagāma; () (Soṇapaṇḍitacariyaṃ; Iti nekkhamma pārami;)
anya-e1208n0:1343_0: Paññāpajāpatipati riputo mumoca; () (Mahosadhacariyaṃ iti paññā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1363_0: Khantiṃ pavattayi manappitakhantimetto; () (Dhammapāla cariyaṃ; Iti khantipāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1398_0: Daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhitavataṃ vata nojahāsi; () (Temiyacariyaṃ; Iti adhiṭṭhāna pāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1408_0: Mettāya samphari samaṃ paribhāvitāya; () (Ekarājacariyaṃ; Iti mettā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1413_0: Veraṃ averamanupecca rarakkhu’pekkhaṃ; () (Lomahaṃsacariyaṃ; Iti upekkhāka pakāramiṃ)
anya-e1208n0:1454_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne
anya-e1208n0:1498_0: Nisajjo paripāsāde so rājā ekadā raho,
anya-e1208n0:1586_0: Yasmā akālo buddhānaṃ tasmā kālaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1589_0: Jāyanti jambudīpasmiṃ tasmā dīpaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1592_0: Jāyare majjhime dese tasmādesaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1595_0: Khantiye brāhmaṇe buddhā kulaṃ tasmā vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1607_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānatidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne
anya-e1208n0:1891_0: Rañño kathesi supinaṃ atha so narindo,
anya-e1208n0:2109_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne
anya-e1208n0:2359_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandananidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne vividhapubbanimittapātubhāvappavatti paridipo.
anya-e1208n0:2899_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne
anya-e1208n0:2899_1: lakkhaṇapaṭiggahaṇa kumārasambharaṇādi pavatti paridipo aṭṭhamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:3150_0: Iti mbedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne pāṇiggahamaṅakgalussavapavattiparidīpo.
anya-e1208n0:3330_0: Yathariva gaṇikaṃ taṃ kañjaniṃ so janindo
anya-e1208n0:3390_0: Iti varamati sutvā tāya gāthaṃ sugītaṃ
anya-e1208n0:3485_0: Alamiti mama vāso handa nikkhamma tamhā
anya-e1208n0:3574_0: Savisamiva pibanto taṃ tuvaṃ ko’si pucchi,
anya-e1208n0:3630_0: Nabhasi khipi sikhaṃ taṃ iccadhiṭṭhāya dhīro
anya-e1208n0:3667_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre
anya-e1208n0:3824_0: Nā go siyā paṭhaminimujjanaṃ ka re
anya-e1208n0:3856_0: Mā kāhase sakha iti dukkaraṃ kharaṃ
anya-e1208n0:3977_0: Vāsaṃ akā vasi mukhato ca nāsato
anya-e1208n0:4223_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hakayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne
anya-e1208n0:4739_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavakijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre
anya-e1208n0:4739_1: nidāne devaputta mārabala viddhaṃsana pavattiparidīpo dvādasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:4990_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidure nidāne
anya-e1208n0:5241_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidure nidāne
anya-e1208n0:5241_1: mahā bodhisattassa ariyamaggañāṇābhisambodhi samadhigama pavattiparidīpo cuddasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:5451_0: Kiṃ tāta kiṃ tāta kimettha jhāyasi
anya-e1208n0:5452_0: Ko te paro kena parājito tuvaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5461_0: Dassāma vo passatha tāta no balaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5553_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n0:5556_0: Vikkhāletvā bhagavati mukhaṃ tasmiṃ nisinne sati,
anya-e1208n0:5557_0: Vāṇijjatthaṃ nija janapadā dve bhātikāka vāṇijā
anya-e1208n0:5562_0: Bhante tumhe anubhavatha no bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n0:5565_0: Sabbe buddhā nahi karatalambhojesu gaṇhanti kho
anya-e1208n0:5570_0: Ekaṃ katvā samuti caturo patte adhiṭṭhāya te
anya-e1208n0:5580_0: Patvā tesaṃ janapadamubho pakkhippa tā dhātuyo
anya-e1208n0:5591_0: Deseyyaṃ kho paṭhamamasamaṃ dhammaṃ imaṃ duddasaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:5602_0: Ācikkhitvā vimati matarī saññāya taṃ dūrato
anya-e1208n0:5603_0: Nibbinditvā katika makaruṃ vaggā samaggā vasī; ()
anya-e1208n0:5605_0: Ñatvā tesaṃ manasi vikatiṃ odissakaṃ samphari
anya-e1208n0:5606_0: Mettaṃ cittaṃ narahari tato phuṭṭhāsamānā vasī,
anya-e1208n0:5633_0: Vassāna’nte pahiṇi muni te bhikkhu disācārikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5648_0: Rañño vācaṃ sumariya puraṃ rājaggahaṃ pāvisi; ()
anya-e1208n0:5655_0: Bhetvā diṭṭhiṃ ciraparicitaṃ te kassapādī vasī
anya-e1208n0:5656_0: Disvā rājā bhagavati tadā dhammaṃcarante tahiṃ,
anya-e1208n0:5671_0: Uṇhākāraṃ janayi’ti tadā hutvā navo māṇavo,
anya-e1208n0:5690_0: Āramaṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ satthā paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n0:5692_0: Tasmiṃ kāle paramamamataṃ ye daḷhamittā ubho
anya-e1208n0:5708_0: Sutvā dhammaṃ adhigami vasī taṃ dhammasenāpatī; ()
anya-e1208n0:5710_0: Dhammassāmī karahaci ubho te sāvakānaṃ mamaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5711_0: Aggaṃ bhaddaṃ yugamiti ime pabyākarotto munī,
anya-e1208n0:5716_0: Buddho hutvā padahiya ciraṃ nissāya rājaggahaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:5737_0: Evaṃ vatvā kapuna saparisaṃ sokāphadāyiṃ tahiṃ
anya-e1208n0:5751_0: Gantuṃ kālo’yamiti adhunā so kāludāyi vasī,
anya-e1208n0:5758_0: Sāyaṃka pāto ahani vivaṭā sabbādisā pākaṭā; ()
anya-e1208n0:5763_0: Dāvaggī te lavamapi manotāpāya vattanti kiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5787_0: Haṃsasseṇika sirasi vajato te bhuyate kiṅkiṇi-
anya-e1208n0:5801_0: Jiṇṇo vuddho mamihapahiṇi tvaṃ daṭṭhukāmo pitā,
anya-e1208n0:5815_0: Taṃ bhuñjanto divasadivase so yojanaṃ yojanaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5820_0: Nānuppatte bhagavati puraṃ no ñātiseṭṭhaṃ kuhiṃ
anya-e1208n0:5833_0: Nissoko so muni parihari sokandhakāraṃ pitu; ()
anya-e1208n0:5838_0: Tumhegantvā paṇamatha jinaṃ vo piṭṭhitāhomै no; ()
anya-e1208n0:5858_0: Vassaṃ vassi nijanakharuciṃ tesaṃ samāje sati; ()
anya-e1208n0:5892_0: Gantvā sīghaṃ khaḷitavacatā putto mahārāja te
anya-e1208n0:5910_0: Uttiṭṭhādiṃ avadi kasugamaṃ gāthaṃ ṭhito vīthiyaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5926_0: Rājā saṅghaṃ sugatapamukhaṃ khajjena bhojjena ca,
anya-e1208n0:5938_0: Taṃ kamaṃ daṭṭhuṃ nanupavisatī’tve’vaṃ vadantī ṭhitā; ()
anya-e1208n0:5966_0: Sīghaṃ jālaṃ vivariya thiyā vīthiṃ vilokentiyā,
anya-e1208n0:5968_0: Pattaṃ bhante haratha vacanaṃ bhatyā na taṃ vyākari; ()
anya-e1208n0:5983_0: Eso tuyhaṃ naraharika pitā iccākaha pakassāhi naṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5988_0: Yācassū’ti pahiṇi pituno ñattaṃ dhanaṃ pettikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5995_0: Dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dadataṃ atthodhanenā’ti me
anya-e1208n0:6012_0: Sutvā kasuttaṃ puna taditaraṃ sikkhāgarūnaṃ garu-
anya-e1208n0:6020_0: Rañño datvā varamati varaṃ bhuttāsano āsanā-
anya-e1208n0:6040_0: Buddhatthaṃ so gahapati mahāmagge samagge divā-
anya-e1208n0:6052_0: Tesaṃ sīsaharañjalihi mahito sutvāna taṃ sāsanaṃ
anya-e1208n0:6054_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka
anya-e1208n0:6054_1: nidāne bhagavato pakiṇṇaka caritappavatti paridīpo soḷasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:6292_0: Yo sadātiya sadā kama taṃ sadā,
anya-e1208n0:6304_0: Vanī janaṃ jetavane vinento; () (Caturakkharika citta yamakaṃ;)
anya-e1208n0:6305_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānanayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n0:6724_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n0:6839_0: Yatana cha phassa cha vedanāti ceko; ()
anya-e1208n0:6975_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n0:7071_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka
anya-e1208n0:7071_1: nidāne bhagavato kasammāsambuddhoti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo vīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:7505_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n0:7505_1: bhagavato vijjācaraṇa sampannoti nāmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:7506_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā sugatoti.
anya-e1208n0:7812_0: Tena so bhuvanattaye sugato siyāti suvissuto; ()
anya-e1208n0:7817_0: Nātho sammā gato tato so sugato; ()
anya-e1208n0:7818_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatināna viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka
anya-e1208n0:7818_1: nidāne bhagavato sutagoti paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo.
anya-e1208n0:7819_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato. Itipiso bhagavā lokavidūti.
anya-e1208n0:7970_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n0:7971_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti.
anya-e1208n0:8127_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā varacite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n0:8127_1: bhagavato anuttaro purisadammasārathīti nāma paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo catubbīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n0:8128_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇekitti saddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā satthā devamanussānaṃti.
anya-e1208n0:8142_0: Sabrahmaṃ sanarāmaraṃ sasamaṇaṃ sabrāhmaṇaṃ yohi so
anya-e1208n0:8147_0: Sattānaṃ tasasate vihiṃsati dhiyā siddhatthasāro tato
anya-e1208n0:8154_0: Taṃkho panabhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃkalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipiso bhagavā buddhoti.
anya-e1208n0:8159_0: Patto ñāṇabalesu pāpuṇi vasībhāvaṃ sayamabhuka sayaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:8161_0: Bodhetā’ti pajāya nibbacanato saccāni so bujjhitā
anya-e1208n0:8163_0: Matyā bujjhanasattiyā mahatiyā yasmā samaṅakgī tato
anya-e1208n0:8178_0: Buddhambhojatibhānano hī bhagavā sāmaṃ pabuddho yato
anya-e1208n0:8200_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n0:8200_1: satthādevamanussānaṃ buddhoti nāmapaññattīnaṃ abhidheya paridīpo pañcavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:8201_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā bhagavāti.
anya-e1208n0:8446_0: Na devatāhi ca nana yena kenaci racitaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:8639_0: Mataṃ so pibanto vamī te ca bhāge; ()
anya-e1208n0:8705_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n0:8780_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāte navannamarahādiguṇānaṃ saṅkhepanayaparidīpo
anya-e1208n0:9090_0: Na ca taṃ paṭivijjhi neva yāci
anya-e1208n0:9123_0: Appossukko samāno viharatu kalimā ho timāsaccayena
anya-e1208n0:9131_0: Loko sokandhakāre paripati janito bhiṃsano lomahaṃso; ()
anya-e1208n0:9132_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n0:9132_1: bhagavato āyusaṅkhārossajjana pavatti paridīpo aṭṭhavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:9134_0: Yenā’nando vasati bhagavā tena gantvā nisinno
anya-e1208n0:9136_0: Bhante sukkhāsati ca elitā hiṃsano lomahaṃso
anya-e1208n0:9149_0: Gabbhokkanto bhacati ca yadā sampajāno satova
anya-e1208n0:9152_0: Ete dhammā samaṇa mahato bhumicālassa hetu; ()
anya-e1208n0:9169_0: Apposasukekā tvamiha kalimā hohi māsehi tīhi
anya-e1208n0:9179_0: Sambodhiṃ tvaṃ yadi bhagavato saddahanto’si kasmā
anya-e1208n0:9181_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sati bhagavatā ka yamāne nimitte
anya-e1208n0:9184_0: Yāceyyāsi yadi dasabalaṃ ce paṭikkhippa vācā
anya-e1208n0:9186_0: Naṇvā’kkhāto samaṇa paṭigacceva me saṅkhataṃ yaṃ
anya-e1208n0:9187_0: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ avipariṇataṃ taṃ kuto’ pe’ttha labbhā; ()
anya-e1208n0:9191_0: Yāsā vācā yathariva chiyāmuttakhāṇo tathā taṃ
anya-e1208n0:9205_0: Yete dhammā sayamadhigatā desitā sādhukaṃ vo,
anya-e1208n0:9222_0: Oloketvā ida mavaca me pacchimaṃ dassana’nti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9229_0: Tisso sikkhā pariharatha vo sādhukaṃ bhikkhave’ti
anya-e1208n0:9239_0: Eso dhammo bhavati vinayo sāsanaṃ satthu cedaṃ
anya-e1208n0:9240_0: Abbhaññātaṃ vata bhagavato sammukhā me sutanti,
anya-e1208n0:9241_0: Sakkhīkatvā yadi vadati maṃ bhikkhave koci bhikkhu
anya-e1208n0:9252_0: Yvābhiññāto paṭibalataro bhikkhu vā sammukhā me
anya-e1208n0:9296_0: Yaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ narahari tahiṃ vissamatto nisajja,
anya-e1208n0:9307_0: Sakkā bhante savati kakudhāsindhu gattāni sīkiṃ
anya-e1208n0:9310_0: Evaṃ vutte puna bhagavatā codito pattahattho
anya-e1208n0:9328_0: Datvā buddhaṃ saraṇa magamā sāṭakaṃ siṅgīvaṇṇaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:9341_0: Dve me laddhā samasamaphalā piṇḍapātā visiṭṭhā,
anya-e1208n0:9343_0: Sse’vaṃ vatvā pariharatu tañcāha me accayena; ()
anya-e1208n0:9372_0: Yo kho dhammaṃ carati samaṇo’ pāsako vā’nudhammaṃ
anya-e1208n0:9373_0: Bhatyā so maṃ paramavidhānā kamānaye pūjayeti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9385_0: Kandantīnaṃ pakiriya sake kesapāse ca bāhā
anya-e1208n0:9426_0: Theraṃ mākhovilapi ala mānanda māsoci hevaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:9433_0: Ātāpī so tvamasi nipapako hesi khīṇāsavoti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9451_0: Rājā hutvā cira manubhaviṃ dhammiko dhammarājā,
anya-e1208n0:9462_0: Uyyānaṃ te pavisiya tadā mallaputtā ca mallā
anya-e1208n0:9475_0: Okāsaṃ me dadatha samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pucchanāya
anya-e1208n0:9477_0: Vutte satthā kilamati alaṃhāvuso mā vihaññi
anya-e1208n0:9490_0: Paññatto yo bhavati vinayo desito yoca dhammo
anya-e1208n0:9491_0: So vo satthā paramasaraṇo’tyā’ha me accayena,
anya-e1208n0:9495_0: Paccakkho no bhavi dasabalo pucchituṃ sammukhā taṃ
anya-e1208n0:9498_0: Saṅghe magge vimati yadivo bhikkhave pucchathāti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9500_0: Yasmā khandhe pajahati jino bhikkhave bhandadāni
anya-e1208n0:9510_0: Taṃ taṃ jhānaṃ muni paṭisamāpajjamāno nirodhā
anya-e1208n0:9534_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n0:9535_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā brahmāsahampati imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9539_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānāsakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9542_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā anuruddho imā gāthāyo abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9547_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā ānando imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9827_0: Bhatyā punappuna mimaṃ sarataṃ sataṃ bho,
anya-e1208n0:9905_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
